actionTemplate.title: Halo eyeshadow (segment method)
steps: Apply a light matte base across the lid and socket
Place a deeper shade on inner and outer lid
Keep the center of lid lighter; add shimmer to pop
Blend the borders so inner/outer fade into the center
Optional: deepen outer corner slightly for more depth

rationaleTemplate: Dark sides + bright center creates a rounder, deeper eye
Blending removes harsh edges and looks cleaner on camera
